HOW-TO¶

Contribute to the documentation¶

The documentation are located at docs. If you want to help improving the documentation you can do it simple as modifying/adding rst files inside the docs. You need to have sphinx and the rtd them installed in your system.

pip install -U sphinx
pip install sphinx-rtd-theme

Once you modify the docs type

cd docs
make html
firefox index.html

You will need to reload the page once you run the make again.

Once you are done with the modifications

git add docs
git commit -m 'update docs'
git push
